channel.title: Shop help please
channel.description:
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -90 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:20157) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18957) at client.packetSending(client.java:18910) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:155) at server.main(server.java:51) retribution Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player retribution ClientHandler: Client retribution disconnected.[/code]
When i try to trade some shops that appears in my runserver and it kicks me off. So, I took out the items....It still appears and kicks me off. Any help, please?...

item.title: Shop help please
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

There are no items in the shops even…And, when I use ::pickup to get the items, they all work. =\

I tried using different npcs for the same shop…Different locations…Nothin’.

Read full topic

are you using the right client. if the client doesn’t have those items then it will log you
